artist: Designer: Bruce Rogers; Author: Sir Thomas More; Author: Introduction by H. G. Wells; Translator: Ralph Robynson; Publisher: The Limited Editions Club; Printer: The Printing House of William Edwin Rudge, Mount Vernon, NY
creditline: Gift of the Estate of Dorothy Millett Lindeke
description: binding: half vellum, gold-stamped lettering; paste paper sides, printed in red and brown; endpapers: white laid; slip case: brown paper over cardboard. lettering printed in brown ink; Linotype Janson; 176 pp.
title: Utopia. Done into English by Ralph Robynson
